講咗幾多個post

James Harden's cousin paul has opened a gym. To date it's been a great success. Outstanding customer service is a major factor in the success of his gym. Of course the quality of the gym and shower equipment also plays a pivotal role in the company's success. He asked me whether I could find a good manager for him. I said "I can't make any promises but I'll see what I can do" Tomiko has an interview for a marketing director position in Paul's gym next week. Paul laid heavy stress on the need for leadership qualities. He also stressed that clear communication skill is a crucial factor in the outcome of the interview. She quit her previous job because the salary was low and her colleagues always bullied her. I said "I don't blame you for leaving" The interview stresses her out. I said "Try not to stress too much about it. Just set your mind at ease. Don't stress yourself out. Put your mind at rest." My brother too said "Don't stress over it. Put your mind at ease. Rest easy. Just set your mind at rest. Don't stress yourself too much." Last Tuesday we ate supper at her place. Her younger brother got Japanese homework to do. He said "I have to do part A but I haven't got to do part B" I said "ill leave you doing your homework" He soaks up new words and grammar patterns very quickly. In the classes he soaks up everything the teacher says. When "Fukushima" is a japanese word you should stress the second third and last syllables. But when it's an english word the stress is only on the third syllable. He was a very extensive vocabulary whereas his classmate john has a fairly small vocabulary. He tries to learn eleven new vocabulary items every day to enrich his vocabulary. He has a vocabulary of around ten thousand words while john has an active vocabulary of about three thousand words. Of course your passive vocabulary is much larger than your active vocabulary. What's the best way of learning new vocabulary ? What's the most ideal way to expand your vocabulary ? Well everyone is different. For me it's via reading a novel over and over again until you remember every part of the story. For Paul it's through reading, creating sentences, writing and pronouncing them. When her younger brother reads a novel he's like a sponge and soaks up the story. If he encounters computer problems he'll find Samuel who's an expert and soak up the advice he offers. His elder brother has a piccolo exam the week after. He said "after this exam I'll do grade eight next year or better still I'll directly take the diploma exam" After chatting with him in his room for a while I said "I'll leave you to get on with your practice" My brother said "I'd better leave you to practise your pieces" My cousin also said "I had better leave you to get on with it" Her eldest brother went to mediate in his room after supper so I left him to himself. Some milk spilt down the chair onto the floor so Tomiko soaked it up with a dishcloth. Her elder sister and her boyfriend booked a massage session. She asked "should i leave my wallet on the nightstand?" Her boyfriend too asked "had i better leave my valuables on the night table?" i said "you'd better not leave them on the bedside table during your session because someone might steal it." My brother said "shouldn't you leave them in your locker so that it's safe?" I too said "hadn't you better leave them in your locker?" Tomio's younger sister has a job interview next Tuesday. I said "I'm rooting for you. I'm there for you. It's gonna be ok." My brother too said "I support you. I've got your back." Her boyfriend has geography exams the week after so he's busy revising at home. I said "you're almost there. You got this." My brother too said "I believe in you." When his professor was tutoring him he said "that's coming along nicely. Keep up the good work. You're learning fast. You're getting better every day. You've almost mastered that." His tutor also said "Now you've got the hang of it. You're on the right track now."

Between VC 同Lavine

係得j-rich睇得下

James Harden's cousin Tomiko has geography exams soon. His tutor said "Now you've got the hang of it. You're on the right track now. Keep it up. You're learning fast." Recently Paul shouted at his brother and called him a liar due to a misunderstanding. I said "I can't believe you would say that to him" My brother too said "I can't believe you said that to him" He'll be giving a birthday party tomorrow but alas I can't attend as I got work to do. When he invited me at first I said "we'll have to see" Paul is making the most elaborate preparations for the party. My cousin asked him "How are the party preparations going?" Peter is assisting with the party preparations. Sudan too is assisting in making preparations for the party. Paul and his friends are sharing the preparation between themselves so that it isn't too much work. Happy birthday Paul. I'm sure your friends will join me in wishing you a very happy birthday. Last year Paul got a king size bed frame and mattress for my birthday. I remember I said "I can't believe you got me a king size mattress and bed frame" They didn't come cheap. Charles has accepted a commission to wrote an article on picasso for an art magazine. He's doing research in preparation for the article. His girlfriend is assisting in the preparation of the research. His favourite fighter Dan will be fighting John in july for the heavyweight title. A championship like this requires proper preparation. The poster and the promo video are in preparation. Dan is doing careful preparation for this fight as he didn't perform well in his last fight because he did no preparation for it. John didn't seem to have done much preparation for his last fight too so this time he's doing thorough preparation for it including boxing, Muay Thai, judo and wrestling as well as strength and conditioning exercise. Sparring regularly is ideal preparation for a match.You cannot fight a high level fighter without adequate preparation. Amy is making preparations for her ski trip in Osaka. She's also making preparations to meet her favourite band X Japan in Tokyo. So she's preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made for next week's ski festival in Osaka. The organizations who organize the ski festival have announced that preparations for it are well under way. Paul's favourite NBA team Chicago Bulls will be playing against Houston Rockets in a playoff game next month. Playoff games like this need adequate preparation. The poster and the promo video for the playoff season are in preparation. The players in Bulls are doing thorough preparation for it as they didn't perform well in their last two games because they did very little preparation. The players in Rockets didn't seem to have done much preparation in their last three games as well so this time they're doing meticulous preparation for it including stealing, blocking, getting rebounds, three point shooting and free throw shooting as well as cardiovascular training. Training at least six hours a day is good preparstion for the playoff season. You cannot play against a high level team without proper preparation.
